# GitHub.vscode-pull-request-github Cache

Holds the `GitHub.vscode-pull-request-github` VSIX payload for offline GitHub PR tooling.

- **Cache path**: `/opt/extensions/GitHub.vscode-pull-request-github`
- **Named volume**: `aspire_github_vscode_pull_request_github_extension_cache`
- **Service**: `github-vscode-pull-request-github-extension`
